name: Piccadilly Potteria
description:
Take over the old pizzeria, and make some pottery on Piccadilly Street! Take the request, get and mould the clay, and then fire it before selling it to the customers coming to see the hottest pottery shop in town.

Created for the Stoke on TREND Games Jam 2021.

Developed by The Junk Draw:

  • Ben Thompson - Programming, Music
  • Jacob Bas - Programming
  • Michael Stone - 3D Art
  • Christian Leary - 2D Art
